title: Android 12 April security patch rolling out to Google Pixel, factory images & OTAs live
content:
Following last month’s launch of 12L, Android 12’s April security patch is rolling out to the Pixel 3a, Pixel 4, Pixel 4a, Pixel 4a 5G, Pixel 5, Pixel 5a, Pixel 6, and Pixel 6 Pro today. It comes as Android 12 QPR3 is in beta and Android 13 is set to follow this month.

more…

The post Android 12 April security patch rolling out to Google Pixel, factory images & OTAs live appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 12 with the April security patch is rolling out to the Pixel 3a, Pixel 4/XL, Pixel 4a/5G, Pixel 5, Pixel 6, and Pixel 6 Pro today...
